TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {7516=Beginning with our Spring 2015 styles, we've improved our women’s fit: There’s a slight increase at the waist for shaping and to ensure the fit is truer to size. All other measurements, such as chest and hip, remain the same. Please refer to our new, updated Women's Size Chart for details. Note: this change applies to full-price Spring 2015 styles, not to past-season or on-sale items.}
textBeforeTable: Women's Sizing Information Fit Guide Size Chart Reviews We promote fair labor practices, safe working conditions and environmental responsibility throughout the Patagonia supply chain. Below are the suppliers that impact the Patagonia Women's Cloud Stack Hoody View our supply chain The Footprint Chronicles® For every Fair Trade Certified item we buy, we pay a premium. The money goes into an account that is controlled by the workers and is specifically designated for social, economic and environmental development projects. Workers may choose to use the money to help build a school or a health clinic, create a scholarship or invest in some other aspect of their other community. Fair Trade Certified™

Beginning with our Spring 2015 styles, we've improved our women’s fit: There’s a slight increase at the waist for shaping and to ensure the fit is truer to size. All other measurements, such as chest and hip, remain the same. Please refer to our new, updated Women's Size Chart for details. Note: this change applies
